review_body: Updated review and Fix for pairing oculus quest Okay, I finally got past the pairing issue I had where the oculus quest refused to pair. It turns out it was an issue where the iPhone required an iOS update and once I did that, it paired no problem. Developers should please add this to the help with setting up an oculus quest. After that, smooth sailing. App is great, quest works really well. While the battery life will last about 4 hours, it‚Äôs still good enough because you don‚Äôt want to be in it too long. All the apps and games are great. I hope more become available soon and that more become cross play as I have an oculus rift also and would enjoy some of those games on the quest as well. Beat saber is crazy good! Also, the oculus app has no lag or issues and you can find the games easy. I would like to see a complete browse all feature so you can scroll through every game available - not sure if I missed it. App is same on phone as it is within headset. Flawless integration. I would like to see a power off feature inside the headset instead of pressing and holding the button to shut down. Keep up the great work!

Great app for Quest owners I e seen many 1 star reviews that make no sense. They are rating the app based on their experience with their headsets. If I were to review the Oculus Quest it would definitely get 4.5 stars. The app however gets a full five stars as it does so much cool stuff. My favorite thing is being able to check my battery while charging my headset. Also being able to see if I need new batteries for my controllers is awesome. I know those data points are on the Quest Menu Bar but when your charging you may not have the Quest available to check so you can use the app. I love that I can buy and install games directly to my headsets from the app too. There are just so many cool things this app allows you to do. I‚Äôve seen lots of tech and I‚Äôm not easily impressed by tech nowadays however the Oculus Quest and this companion app have highly impressed me. I haven‚Äôt been wowed like this by tech since I first wrote a program in basic back on a TRS-80 (Trash 80 for those who remember them) in the mid 80‚Äôs(I‚Äôm old I know). Thanks for an exciting and joyous experience both in the app and on the console.

Set up utility for Oculus Go worked Ok Worked fine and used it to get oculus go set up. This app has the store and setup screens for the stand alone headset, and recently added WiFi streaming, which was really helpful when showing relatives what VR is like because I could put their view on the phone and help talk them through how to play better and they could give each other advice.  They really enjoyed the Keep Talking and Virtual Virtual Reality ones.

Still no casting (Major Fail) I love the idea of the go and I enjoyed the initial implementation of the headset. That being said the only issue that I have a problem with now that‚Äôs ruining the experience is that there is still no casting or a release date. If you aren‚Äôt ready to activate casting then why put it into the app update notes? Also, why is it that despite being a major feature request, there‚Äôs zero information about its progress or an estimated release date other than ‚Äúsoon‚Äù. If you really want your initial go adopters to push for your product then why take away the one thing that could help them promote the headset to others? In summary, it‚Äôs a fun headset for a while but without the added social feature you might use the headset once every couple of weeks just to see if there‚Äôs anything new (which there won‚Äôt be).

Almost Perfect! I love the easy access to the oculus store. I really appreciate that I do not have to put my headset on every time I want to buy a game my friend tells me about. I love that I can start a game in the headset before I‚Äôm ready to play it to warm the headset up and reduce loading times. One thing is missing though: Often, I will find an amazing game in the Oculus AppStore, and I will want to share it with a friend. Unfortunately, either there is not a ‚Äúshare app‚Äù button, or it is just really hard to find. Please add a ‚ÄúShare App‚Äù button in the Oculus Store! I would love to be able to send my friends a direct link to the cool new game I want them to try!

Unable to sort app reviews or access version notes I love using this app as it makes it much easier to manage apps on the Oculus Quest, but with the recent update I no longer have the ability to sort app reviews or access the version + release notes. I like to sort the reviews by most recent for when apps are upgraded so I can get a better idea of how the app is now instead of seeing older reviews. Also, I can‚Äôt access the version + release notes for applications anymore either. I use to be able to click on the version + release notes under the app details and see what has been updated on an app. I am still able to do this if I access the Oculus store from a PC so I am using that as a workaround, but it would be great if you all could restore these functions back to the iOS app.

Are commenters trolling?  Easy setup I was reading the comments, and most of the 1 stars are bizarre.  I can‚Äôt tell if they are trolling or completely confused to be nice.  (Anyone read the comment about watching Netflix in VR from the appü§î)

Good app that‚Äôs getting better all the time I been using the app since it showed up on App Store.... LoL sort of need it for the quest.   And it was a rough start but they have been working on improving it and it‚Äôs gotten sooooooo much better. We use the casting all the time so we can help our special needs kiddo play....would love to see some sort of accessibility feature that helps with sight like a zoom for the casting where tapping the screen puts a zoomed bubble next to the finger to help with reading things... thanks for all the hard work

Important problem with battery So, recently my phone has been draining its battery, and I went to check Battery in settings. As the title may imply, it said the Oculus app was eating up /50% of my battery/

Great app! I got a quest and was worried that it would not connect because of the bad reviews on the app and such. However, I was very impressed when I got it! Setup took only ten minutes and got up and running quickly!  When I did not like a game, I asked to refund it and got a refund that same day!  Also you can check the battery life from your phone so I knew when I needed to charge. Casting is great. I played a game while my brother watched and we both had fun! Overall, very impressive with no cons!

Great side app for oculus go! I use this app almost everyday to look at games. The app has a great theme to it which makes it easy to look at. The only request I have about the app is the paying options. I get iTunes cards often but don‚Äôt use them because I have nothing to use them on. I really hope at some point you could add support for iTunes gift cards.

Why doesn‚Äôt the App support Apple Pay! I like the VR experience, but I don‚Äôt understand why you have to enter payment information in the app. Usually all Apps use the payment feature from your iTunes account. Is it because of the privacy terms or how facebook gives information to third-parties? Or why not Apple Pay it‚Äôs more secure... Please some of the games offered on Oculus say they will collect email & phone numbers and information from files... now please tell me what files are third parties looking at on your phone...
A Must-Have App I am writing this review regarding the Oculus app, not the VR experience (which is also amazing).

Both headset and controller don‚Äôt work at all I was excited to receive my oculus go when I ordered it from the website and it worked well for the first week but after that the sound would stop working, my controller stopped connecting and eventually stopped working all together and now my headset won‚Äôt even turn on even after being charged for hours, the light doesn't come on either. Im very upset that I wasted a hefty $215 on it for it to stop working before even an years mark. I want my money back or for a solution to this issue because another friend of mine with the same headset is having the exact problem.

Not downloading apps... I own two headsets and neither of them will allow me to re-download apps like showtime anytime, do now and Facebook 360... again BOTH headsets experiencing this issue.. one just purchased last night out of the box. When it works it is alright but when it doesn‚Äôt it‚Äôs annoying... also the oculus app on the phone is terrible... all we need to see are fresh new apps and the ones that are installed... the fact that we can‚Äôt even easily see which apps are installed on the phone is very annoying to say the least.

Corrected my issues Previous issues I had are corrected the the app, I am happy. Works flawlessly for me, and I love that I can start a download from work and come home and the downloaded apps, games and videos are ready to go! Great job. Only one hope in the future.  Would love to play game videos in wide screen. The small sized video on a phone would be made better by being full screen. But such a minor concern. Thank you for the fixes you perform. Hope quest gets more games soon!

Casting to Chromecast / TV Hey team, I have an Oculus Go & and an Oculus Quest my company recently bought to utilize for event marketing. We‚Äôre a large venue trying to use VR to show our clients various event setups that we do, and before we launch our program we‚Äôre testing all the bugs for Chromecast capabilities on both platforms. So far, we‚Äôve had great trouble getting consistent casting out of our devices‚Äîoften being unable to connect headsets to our office TVs and even our phones from time to time‚Äîtrust me when I say I‚Äôve looked at all the troubleshooting guides. WiFi is not an issue as we have high-speed internet, and a brand new Chromecast device.

No User Profiles People have been screaming at oculus to have multiple user profiles instead of locking the oculus down to one facebook profile and they‚Äôre completely tone deaf to the issue. this means that you really can‚Äôt share it with your family and friends the way you can with any video game console or computer. so i can‚Äôt save my progress in a game and then let my kids save their progress in the same game. or i can‚Äôt have my favorite browser pages bookmarked without mixing them with my families, or saved videos and so on. if you want to share a vr headset with family or others i‚Äôd suggest looking elsewhere.

Love the game play, hate the pairing. Numerous users have had issues with pairing their devices to stream their game play, whether it be for Twitch, Mixer or just so you‚Äôre not awkwardly swinging your arms around in front of your friends at a get together.
Fantastic product Totally beyond expectations.

Crashing Issue I will rate it five because of the gameplay and app usage but for some bizzare reason it crashes for me every 35 seconds when I log onto the app. Please fix this. I can barely read a game description without an app crash. Every single time it crashes it sends me to my phone homescreen. Please fix this. I can barely use my Oculus now.

Crashing Issue I will rate it five because of the gameplay and app usage but for some bizzare reason it crashes for me every 35 seconds when I log onto the app. Please fix this. I can barely read a game description without an app crash. Every single time it crashes it sends me to my phone homescreen. Please fix this. I can barely use my Oculus now.

I Love It and the Quest. I love how easy it is to setup an Oculus Quest, and I‚Äôm assuming it‚Äôs easy for the Rift, Rift S, and Go, too. I also like the casting feature, and I get why you can‚Äôt cast or record Beat Saber (Copyright reasons). One thing is that it doesn‚Äôt show the ‚ÄúAllow Quest to cast‚Äù straight away, I have to hold the Oculus button for it to show up, and it takes me a while to get to the home page by pressing the Oculus button. But, all and all, it‚Äôs easy, nice, and amazing!
Great hardware but buggy software I love the Oculus Quest however there are some issues that are really breaking my experience.

Can‚Äôt even set boundaries I have an oculus quest and it asked me to set boundaries it was difficult but I got through it and eventually made it in to the main menu. I then went to dinner and when I got back the VR asked me to set boundaries yet again, annoyed I did this again but then the machine wouldn‚Äôt let me submit them. The oculus support does not help at all so don‚Äôt tell me to go there. For such a expensive product you would think that they would work out simple bugs. Very disappointed and I can‚Äôt rate it any higher because I haven‚Äôt been able to get in to the thing. What a waste of money.
Oculus Quest is so SICK Highly recommend the Quest! My son loves it and we play it together all the time.

Why no iPad version? The app works well enough on my iPhone, but I‚Äôm surprised that it‚Äòs not a universal app that works well on iPad. iPad is perfect for casting, but performs poorly due to the this being merely an upscaled iPhone app. A proper iPad (or universal) version of this app with landscape orientation support is much needed, in my opinion. Please make it happen guys! Otherwise I‚Äôm extremely pleased with my Oculus Quest and continually impressed with the latest innovations. I would just love for this app to match the level of polish of the headset.

Refund If anyone is having issues with getting their money back, I did too. It at average takes a week for me, but last time it took about twenty days. You just have to be patient. Other than that I t is a great app. Does everything well, except I would like a different style friends menu. It doesn‚Äôt really tell anything.

OCULUS IS USELESS NOW, DESERVES ZERO STARS My sister and I were using Oculus to meet in a private room so that we could chat, etc. She is not allowed to have a Facebook account because of a control freak husband and I haven't been on Facebook for over two years and don't miss it. On Facebook, I couldn't ever log in privately, because Facebook wants everyone to know that you are online or actively using messenger, etc. Now Facebook wants to carry that crap over to Oculus. I'm glad I had only bought a few APPS for Oculus and didn't waste any more money than I did for the expensive crappy useless toy.

Love my Oculus but it needs to connect to my tv I have a recently bought Sony 4K with built in Chromecast but can not connect it. My family likes to watch each other play but the Oculus refuses to connect. I don‚Äôt need an Apple TV or a Chrome Ultra just for this. It makes no sense why a wireless device can‚Äôt connect to a state of the art smart tv, no matter what additional apps I buy for my iPhone. Otherwise I love it.
A good app with a wide selection of VR experiences There are two features I would like to see implemented.

What a waste of money Played with the Go headset for about 30 minutes and I just wasn‚Äôt at all impressed. PR was fantastic selling this half-baked VR. The content is simply not there and the tech behind the Go is just not worth the expense to the consumer. There are too many hyped reviewers that are misleading prospective customers. Too many claims are made and the unit doesn‚Äôt deliver. ‚ÄúCrystal clear optics‚Äù yeah, no. I‚Äôll be sharing a detailed review on my website geared to consumers in the upcoming days. Don‚Äôt buy the Go, and if you buy the quest get it from a store that allows returns.

love the oculus quest One obvious addition that needs to be added to the quest is the ability to watch movies and access media while laying down and in the dark. Perhaps using the joysticks? Other than that I love it so far. Please add this feature, it is much needed and shouldn‚Äôt be too hard to implement relative to the other things that the quest can do.

Oculus Quest Needs Multiple Users feature While I have had no problems with the app itself other than casting issues at times, I am disappointed that the Oculus Quest doesn‚Äôt allow for multiple users. Our whole family uses this headset and this lack of feature makes it impossible for one user to start a game and save their progress while another user starts the same game from the beginning.

The app is good, but a suggestion This app for all intents and purposes does exactly what it needs to. But there are some quality of of life things that could be added. Being able to add something to your wishlist on the app would be nice, in case you‚Äôd like to stay out of the headset for a little bit comes to mind.

WiFi problem I have had my oculus quest for a few days now and I have been struggling with it because it keeps disconnecting from WiFi due to a authentication problem and it is very annoying but other than that it is still very fun and entertaining to use and I really do hope that this problem is fixed soon as possible as I know that I am not the only one has this problem.

Casting I‚Äôve been having a lot of casting problems. I‚Äôve used the advice to shut down my phone and restart the Oculus Quest and it worked but then it stopped. So I did it again but this time it didn‚Äôt work. Maybe their is a bug that y‚Äôall can fix. Please try to fix this.

Casting Issues This app is not terrible, it is helpful for setting up your oculus headset and purchasing apps and games from the oculus store. The reason I give it 4 stars is for the consistency of the casting to your phone. They need an update that fixes the reliability of it because it is a great function for showing family and friends what the person using VR is seeing.

Casting fail I don‚Äôt know why but the casting feature isn‚Äôt working my phone is up to date and so is the app and my quest and phone is on the same WiFi and they are connected and when I try to cast it says the headset is not found and it tells me to make sure they are on the same WiFi and try again but they are on the same WiFi and it just keeps saying the same thing

Used to be Great I was very happy with the way the app worked and functioned. Could find friends and hang out easily in VR. This is no longer possible as they are now ‚Äúusing Facebook to power social features‚Äù.
Fixed: Does not open Update: uninstalling and reinstalling the app solved my problem so upping my score. Still no more than a three simply because it broke and required to setup the Oculus Go.
Love the Oculus Go - hate the app! Crashes on start! The Oculus Go headset is incredible! Immersive, wireless, comfortable and performs fantastic.

Nice app overall, streaming is hard to set up by yourself though Has a lot of nice features, but streaming is really hard to set up on your own. You have to keep a hand on the screen while setting it up on the phone, otherwise streaming breaks as soon as you move your head away.

Landscape, Landscape, Landscape Not all of us are iPhone owners, not all of us like to hold our iPads vertically in our hands? When will developers see the need for their apps to work in landscape mode? Based on a study I read online, most iPad users prefer landscape mode, especially if using a portfolio or an external keyboard. Come on guys, this is super annoying... Otherwise, the app is decent. Love my Quest!

Pretty good partner but... A very competent home app, very nice how it allows shopping and settings and such from outside the headset too. I‚Äôd just like to request some more stability for connecting the phone to the headset stream, it doesn‚Äôt always find it easily, as well as better stream quality, it freezes or skips frames a lot.

Pretty good but needs landscape support for storefront videos I don‚Äôt understand why the app doesn‚Äôt show App Store videos full screen, as this seems to be in almost every app that plays videos.  It doesn‚Äôt need full-time landscape, just in the store for the preview videos.  If they add this I‚Äôll give it 5 stars instead of 4.

Couldn‚Äôt be worse I‚Äôve never seen a worse app, the purchasing system is broken and the quest itself is the worst gaming system around, terrible quality games, doesn‚Äôt work half the time, the charging for the quest is janky, you have to charge it all day just to get 20 mins of play time tops. I‚Äôve never regretted a larger purchase more than this. For purchasing an app you have to have the pin, the pin doesn‚Äôt work, you can change the pin all you want, won‚Äôt work.

Amazing Love IT The app is great but the only thing that I would recommend is making it The IPad screen because I have an IPad and The screen is not in full screen and aside from that I love how you can buy apps / games directly from the app onto the Your VR headset. All in all the app is awesome

Updating system software I love the oculus go and all the games I‚Äôve played on it. However I can‚Äôt seem to get my oculus to download any software update past version 3.45 and I‚Äôm not sure why. I just bought a game that I would love to play, I just can‚Äôt get it to update

Needs Camera Roll Support! This app should include a place where you can see and download clips from your camera roll(on your Oculus Device) to either save directly to your phone or post on social media. A bit cumbersome to have to connect the Quest to a computer in order to get footage.

Slow The app is great in just about every way, I enjoy having an app that can link with my Go. However, the loading for the app can be crazy slow. Pictures for apps and games can take minutes to pop up which makes looking for new games troublesome.

Works great! This app works just fine! It hooked up seamlessly to my go and when you select apps to download, it puts them in queue on the oculus go and downloads start immediately. Very convenient for those who want to browse apps on their phone. üëç

One thing... The ONLY issue I have is simple... Why can‚Äôt you change your profile picture at all ? I looked in the app and I even went to the website. That‚Äôs the only downfall. Other than that, everything is great.

Suggestion Add in iPad support. I would like to view the app on an iPad which has longer battery life. Plus I can see what is playing on the headset on a larger screen. Also, if you make this app support iPad (12.9 inch) make sure you support landscape mode.
Casting Issues As of now the main appeal of the phone app is the ability to cast to chrome cast devices.

Great app but not supported for iPad Pro Love the app on my phone but I feel it could get a tablet or iPad version. It looks pretty silly being tiny or stretched on a larger screen but would be easier to use for guiding first timers. I love that feature. Keep up the good work. 5 stars when it looks gorgeous on all screens.

Kinda bummed with the app Got a Quest a few days ago. Casting via the app has been god awful. It got even worse after the update to 12.0. Bought a Chromecast to attempt casting to. The app doesn‚Äôt even display the Chromecast even though I can easily cast any other app to it. Did a little searching on the internet and there are sooooo many complaints about this. Please tell me this will be resolved soon!

Anyone know how to change profile picture? Hi, I have a oculus quest and I was trying every way I could think of changing my profile picture. Can anyone help me change my profile picture. I would prefer a method on iPhone.

Really Useful! This app really helps with managing your Oculus headsets, and downloading apps without putting on the headset. The instructions are very easy to follow and show you how to set up your headset. I would still be trying to reset my Oculus Go controller of it wasn‚Äôt for this app. If you own an Oculus headset, this is definitely recommended

I couldn‚Äôt find any app anymore I played on headset before and it worked fine. I could active apps on home or library. After I downloaded the quest in my iPad, there is nothing on home or library. On quest, I can find apps and click start. it shows the app has been activated, but after I wear the headset, the app shows for couple of seconds, then disappear. When I go to setting and application, it shows no permission.  What‚Äôs wrong with it? Please help!

Joke- nope it's Silicon Valley sales It says stand alone on the box - the first thing you are asked to do is down load this App on your i-phone to enable your headset with very specific network requirements ...  Ridiculous ... if "old" product companies (GM, GE etc) told you your car/washing machine was stand alone, and the first thing they required is you owned a product from another company to operate you'd go ballistic and return the BS product ... which is exactly what I will do tomorrow.  GROW UP Silicon Valley .

Excellent even without headset Now, I‚Äôm not that great at judging things but straight off the bat this app feels organized and well made. I‚Äôm about to get my quest so I haven‚Äôt tried everything, but I give it a thumbs up just for being excellent!üëçüèª

New games (Quest) Hey Oculus! I love the gaming headset and I got a lot of cool games, but I was wondering if you could add more shooting games to the quest. I was looking at the new games, but the only shooting games were on the rift or rift s. I would be a lot happier if you could add some shooting games to the quest.

Annoying icon What‚Äôs with the annoying notification number on the app icon that won‚Äôt go away!? I keep checking my notifications to make sure I‚Äôve read my messages but the number won‚Äôt go away. Also, the screen mirroring is obnoxiously laggy. I know this is all still pretty new tech but man, the growing pains are rough...

The app is great but needs ipad support. This app is awesome and helped me setup my quest, buy games, and cast so my friends can see what I‚Äôm playing, but it‚Äôs annoying that it‚Äôs in the format of an iPhone when I‚Äôm using an iPad. The 2 black bars on the side and low quality really make the app flawed on here.

You may or may not be able to help me on this So everything works great on the oculus it‚Äôs just one thing the smell the gaming dosnt give me headaches the smell dose bc it‚Äôs right on your nose and the smell will give you that so if there are any tips on how to do that pleas tell me

Please read Everything is great but one problem!! DEVELOPER MODE does not work I made 4 organizations and it still won't turn on. it keeps directing me to the website please fix this as soon as possible!!

Can you make games in app purchases? This is pretty good overall, and it‚Äôs nice how you can stream the headset to the device, but maybe make it so buying games is an in app purchase. I think it would be more convenient, plus you could gift cards to buys games.

Frustrating Oculus Go literally won‚Äôt allow me to pair with Facebook.  I keep getting new codes, come up with new passwords, I can see my Facebook profile pic through the Oculus goggles, but I can‚Äôt pair, which is frustrating since I‚Äôd like to use Oculus Venues, which you can‚Äôt do unless you pair with Facebook. About to tear my hair out.  I had an infinitely easier time setting up my brand new TV today.   PLEASE FIX.

Problem with the oculus quest So I wanted Pavlov and zero caliber and mine craft and blades and sorcery and final assault but nooo and if you say a space issue super hot son there I mean this is more of a feedback and I hope this gets the attention of the developer and they change it.
Latest update is much better Most recent update fixed crashing app. I check it every day to see what the app of the day is. Much faster than the website

Great The oculus go is a great easy to use system. This app just makes it easer. It enables you to browse and download games while your away from home.  The concept is great and the devs should never stop working to make it better.

Wishlist wish! Overall - the app is useful and easy to navigate. One thing it is missing is the ability to edit my wishlist.  I can not remove apps once I have purchased them. It clutters up my list... it should be easy enough to add this function.

Works Good! The app works great and I can cast to my chrome cast and iPad. I can‚Äôt cast with my phone though, there‚Äôs always a casting error. I‚Äôm not too worried about my phone casting though. It works great and that‚Äôs all that matters to me. The app is very convenient.

Something is Wrong with the update function So I‚Äôve been on both my VR headset and app on my iPhone and I don‚Äôt see any update or automatic update option please check this app and double check if you added the function I have an iPhone 7 Plus maybe that‚Äôs why because other than that idk

Great app and works great with my Quest I just recently got the oculus quest and am already astonished with how easy it is to use it with the app I‚Äôm out of my house a lot and I love being able to download games from my phone.

amateur hour ... pairing/WiFi process is completely broken Spent hours trying to set the device up, to no avail. The saddest part is that this bug (‚Äúincorrect wi-fi password‚Äù even when correct) has been constantly reported on forums and official channels for the past two years!
Dosent work on iPhone! You expect from a firm like Facebook to make sure the product is working as promised before sealing it in stores .

Works great The app works great for just about everything except sound.  If you have your silence switch on, the sound wont play for videos.  Flicking it on will make the video sound play.  This behavior is something I only see in this app.

I had some issues When I tried to put in my card information in the app it says ‚Äúsomething went wrong. Try again.‚ÄùSo I tried several times even with a different card. I like most of the free games but I feel like I‚Äôm missing out on the paid games.

Question So I love oculus but do you guys know if you are going to support steam vr on the oculus quest? Because I really like many of the steam vr games and I don‚Äôt have a very good pc so I‚Äôm probably gonna get the oculus quest but I don‚Äôt know if there is or ever will be compatible with steam vr.

Audio isn‚Äôt working. This rating is harsh then normal since there is a bug in the app. I will fix the review once they fix the bug. At the moment audio is not working natively on my phone. Tried changing every setting I can and audio plays just fine on other apps so it‚Äôs not the phone. Fix your audio issues Oculus!!!

Quest I love all the games but there is one game that I would truly love to be added to the assortment of games and that is the game Blade and sorcery and if you could add that I would be so happy and many others would be to.

Good app, one problem for me Great app, does mostly what I ask of it. My only problem is that I am unable to cast in whenever or however I try. I‚Äôve tried the troubleshooting steps, if it starts working, I‚Äôll try my best to remember to update this review.

I can‚Äôt make purchases Whenever I try to add a new card to my payment info it says unable to add new payment. My friend said when he made a new account he was able to add a new card but I don‚Äôt want to make a new account and lose all my already purchased games

Great but... I would give this a 5 star because my oculus quest is amazing it has amazing graphics and gameplay. But when I wanna buy a game with a visa gift card I have to have the money on that gift card I can‚Äôt combine them together to purchase a game.

I enjoy the use of this app I enjoy this app a lot, but I can‚Äôt add no payment methods or find any types of gift cards to redeem to buy games on the app. Is there anything that can be done about it?

Can't log in with fb account You goto be kidding me, just downloaded the app on my iphone to go with my new oculus quest. Open app, asks me to log in with fb account, tap continue, takes me to fb app, logs in, takes me back ro oculus app with a page says "close this tab", hit done, back to log in page, infinite loop, tried everything. A 5th world software company can make better software, how? How about make it USABLE for start?

It won‚Äôt let me download my preordered games So I preordered doctor who edge of time and still haven‚Äôt been able to play it, it just keeps saying ‚Äúpre-ordered‚Äù. It won‚Äôt even let me download it through my quest. Can you please fix this because I payed MONEY, for something I can‚Äôt use and came out months ago. It‚Äôs no longer preordered, it‚Äôs now theft

No support on IPad Pro The app has no actual support for the IPad Pro, its just the iPhone version squished into the screen.
